text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Call of Duty: Warzone. The build quality of the ASUS ROG Strix Scar II Gaming Laptop, 15.6" 144 Hz IPS-Type Full HD, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 8 GB, Intel Core i7-8750H Processor, 16 GB DDR4, 512 GB PCIe NVMe SSD, RGB KB, Windows 10 - GL504GW-DS74 is solid, and the battery life is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Starfield and Fortnite. The build quality of the ASUS ROG Strix Scar II Gaming Laptop, 15.6" 144 Hz IPS-Type Full HD, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 8 GB, Intel Core i7-8750H Processor, 16 GB DDR4, 512 GB PCIe NVMe SSD, RGB KB, Windows 10 - GL504GW-DS74 is solid, and the build material is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for content creation and gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2070 in the ASUS ROG Strix Scar II Gaming Laptop, 15.6" 144 Hz IPS-Type Full HD, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 8 GB, Intel Core i7-8750H Processor, 16 GB DDR4, 512 GB PCIe NVMe SSD, RGB KB, Windows 10 - GL504GW-DS74 is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for competitive gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The build material is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS ROG Strix Scar II Gaming Laptop, 15.6" 144 Hz IPS-Type Full HD, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 8 GB, Intel Core i7-8750H Processor, 16 GB DDR4, 512 GB PCIe NVMe SSD, RGB KB, Windows 10 - GL504GW-DS74!
